sentences.en: A tropic heat wave is expected to hit the city.

sentences.en: By the path, we saw a number of white - tailed tropic birds.

sentences.en: Dry rosin is best in tropic and soft rosin in cold climate.

sentences.en: From her mother she inherited warmth of nature and dusky, semi - tropic beauty.
sentences.cn: 她从母亲那儿秉承了热情的性格和亚热带的那种皮肤微黑的美.

sentences.en: The Tropic of Cancer is the most northerly latitude in the Northern Hemisphere.

sentences.en: the Tropic of Capricorn/the Tropic of Cancer
The tropic sun glared down on us all day.
sentences.cn: 热带的太阳整日灼晒着我们。

sentences.en: There was a restaurant a little way off Broadway where one could be served almost al fresco in a tropic array of screening flora.
sentences.cn: 离百老汇不远有一家餐馆，在那里用餐几乎像是置身于户外一排热带遮护植物中一样。

trans.tran_en: one of the two imaginary lines around the world, either the Tropic of Cancer which is 23.5˚ north of the  equator  , or the Tropic of Capricorn which is 23.5˚ south of the equator
